metadata.name: City of Inner Reflections
metadata.description:
Immersive visualization that merges the dynamic energy of a bustling metropolis with the introspective journey of self-discovery. A invitation to reflect on your own inner growth and navigate the vibrant cityscape of possibilities within.

1. Find a quiet space to sit or lay comfortably.
2. Play the 20-second meditation with audio, focusing your gaze on the captivating visuals.
3. Breathe deeply and take a moment to reflect on the experience.
4. Repeat if desired.

Created with intention and love, using a unique fusion of AI-driven visuals and music (Midjourney, Kaiber, MusicLM).
